LearningOutcome1: Develop a foundational understanding of Blockly programming by learning basic syntax, data types, expressions, variables, and operations
LearningOutcome2: Demonstrate proficiency in controlling robots and developing logic using visual programming
LearningOutcome3: Apply programming logic using data structures, conditions and branching, loops, functions, and problem-solving techniques
LearningOutcome4: Access and extract robot sensor data by working with hardware APIs and performing data analysis
